revised_title: In-depth Study of the Entozoon folliculorum, a Newly-Discovered Parasitic Animalcule in Human Skin
tldr: Erasmus Wilson investigates the structure and development of a newly-discovered parasitic animalcule, Entozoon folliculorum, which lives in sebaceous follicles of human skin. He corrects inaccuracies in the initial description of the organism and provides detailed anatomical analysis of its various organs and developmental stages.
